QuestData.Title: Mechanical Eye
QuestData.Description:
<As the mechanical body of Unit 17 crumples into a heap, one eye lights up.
You hear a popping noise, and the eye flies from the head, aided by a small explosion.
You pick up the eye and notice it twitch a few times, then power down.
The citizens of Rustbolt seem to like junk, maybe they'll be interested in this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Mechanical Eye to Vera Lonelycog in Rustbolt on Mechagon Island.
